Class ResultsPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • massim.webclient.ResultsPage

  • public class ResultsPage
extends Object
    This class generates the result page, both for the tomcat and for the static version created by createResultsPage.java

      • position

        public static int position(TeamData[] teamList,
           int teamnumber,
           int numberOfTeams)
        This methods "calculates" the current position of each team in the ranking.
        Parameters:
        teamList - list of all teams
        teamnumber - number of team for which the position is "calculated"
        numberOfTeams - number of participating teams
        Returns:
        position of team in the ranking
